[[File:KingsRock.png|thumb|200px|The Kings Rock]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Kings Rock costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Azalea Town]] in [[Johto]]. It can also be found after defeating Wild Slowbro.
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Poliwhirl || | Politoed |- | Slowpoke || | Slowking |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
